title: A Warrior Wedding
description: After a devastating blow, the VC Warriors find themselves fighting, but not an enemy they can see. Their power and expertise alone cannot save the ones they love. Breaking new and old laws, one Warrior is determined to save his mate no matter the consequences, but will his mate agree to be his downfall. *DISCLOSURE* No Warrior or main character was seriously injured during the writing of this book. ;)
author: Teresa Gabelman
